CustomField.description: Field used on Planners to show color coding.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(pse__Project__r.pse__Billing_Type__c, "Time and Materials") && ISPICKVAL(pse__Project__r.pse__Project_Type__c, "Customer Project") , "lightyellow", IF( ISPICKVAL(pse__Project__r.pse__Billing_Type__c, "Fixed Price") && ISPICKVAL(pse__Project__r.pse__Project_Type__c, "Customer Project"), "Turquoise", ""))
CustomField.label: Planner Color
